sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../styles/tour-detail.css'; import { Container, Row,Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom'; import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const TourDetail = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour=>tour.id === id) const {photo,title,desc,price,reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize} = tour return <>

{title}

.d
} export default TourDetail
